(+ 2 (+ 1 1))
(setq my-name "zhuliminl")
(insert "hello!" "world")
(insert "hello " my-name)
(defun hellox() (insert " Hello " my-name))
(hello)

(defun greet (name) (insert "Hello" name))
(greet "you")

(defun foo (name)
  (insert (format "Hello %s!\n " name)))

(foo "you"
Hello you!
